title: Evolution Satan's Lie & Proof God Exists
description: The theory of evolution is a antiquated theory at best or a lie at its worst. There have been many proofs for evolution but all have been disproven. Only one part of evolution is true and that is micro evolution or the changes that occur within a species. But for evolution to be valid it has to prove that one species can turn into a different species. There is no evidence that a species can turn into another species! Therefore the theory of evolution is not valid! The only other theory available is creation which requires a God. This book will show the lies of evolution and the truth that God exists.
author: Terry Hueffed
